o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_PivotAggregatedAttributeEdit
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) ' Show the object picker and fetch the selected source object. Dim selSourceObj : Set selSourceObj = SelectSourceObject(obj)
' If a source object was selected, go on. If Not(selSourceObj Is Nothing) Then
' Show the object picker and fetch the selected source attribute. Dim selAttribute : Set selAttribute = SelectSourceObjectAttribute(selSourceObj)
' If a source object was selected update attribute mapping. If Not(selAttribute Is Nothing) Then ' Update the source object. obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_PivotAggregatedAttribute", selAttribute obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_PivotAggregatedAttribute_SourceObject", selSourceObj End If
End If End Sub
